text: The Battle of Aster Fall was the final battle between Adam Carthalion and the Battlemage Ravidel in the year 1265 by the Reckoning of the Sages of Minorad . Named after the falling of a star that evening, it resulted in Adam Carthalion's death. During the battle, Adam ordered his spellsquire Ezer to take his son, Jared , and flee.
